name: Pho Sure
reviews: Pho Sure (pun intended) is a hip Vietnamese restaurant on Manhattan's Christopher Street.</br>The 'Pho Real' is especcially good.

name: Pho Pastuer
reviews: Remember, Vietnam was once a French colony so the name Pho Pasteur doesn't seem to out of place.</br>In the heart of Dallas' 'little Saigon' district this is my goto place for pho.
